title: Griddled tuna with summer herb crust
ingredients: ['4 tuna steaks, about 150g each', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '2 tbsp olive oil', '4 tbsp dry white wine', '50g ciabatta breadcrumbs', '40g pine nuts', '2 tbsp chopped fresh basil', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', '50g sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained and chopped', 'juice and grated zest of 1 lemon', '4 beef tomatoes', '8 large basil leaves', 'TO SERVE 250g baby spinach leaves']
